remarks: Lemma for ~ ablfac .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Apr-2016.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 3-May-2016.)
statement:
ablfac.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
ablfac.c $e |- C = { r e. ( SubGrp ` G ) | ( G |`s r ) e. ( CycGrp i^i ran pGrp ) } $.
ablfac.1 $e |- ( ph -> G e. Abel ) $.
ablfac.2 $e |- ( ph -> B e. Fin ) $.
ablfac.o $e |- O = ( od ` G ) $.
ablfac.a $e |- A = { w e. Prime | w || ( # ` B ) } $.
ablfac.s $e |- S = ( p e. A |-> { x e. B | ( O ` x ) || ( p ^ ( p pCnt ( # ` B ) ) ) } ) $.
ablfac.w $e |- W = ( g e. ( SubGrp ` G ) |-> { s e. Word C | ( G dom DProd s /\ ( G DProd s ) = g ) } ) $.
ablfaclem1 $p |- ( U e. ( SubGrp ` G ) -> ( W ` U ) = { s e. Word C | ( G dom DProd s /\ ( G DProd s ) = U ) } ) $.
$d A p s x $.
$d B g p r s w x $.
$d C g p s w x $.
$d G g p r s w x $.
$d O p x $.
$d S g r s $.
$d U g s $.
$d W p w x $.
$d p ph s w x $.
